post.text:
Wishing you a very, very Happy Fourth of July! There's a lot to celebrate and there will be more to celebrate come November when we take back America! #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

DONATE NOW: donaldjtrump.com/july-4th

comment.author: Corey
comment.text: FBI Director James Comey is a honorable and decent man. The FBI could be the only Fed Dept that is not corrupt. Our next celebration will come when he charges Crooked Hillary with crimes.

replies.author: Sara
replies.text: If she walks, will you still think they are honorable?

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: I believe this as well. I'm not as convinced that Lynch will act on the referral.

replies.author: Alexandria
replies.text: I heard yesterday she won't be charged?

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: Alexandria I believe that was a false report by CNN.

replies.author: Michaela
replies.text: Alexandria watches too much clinton news network!!!!!
